items.title: Salesforce, Inc. (CRM) Is Competing With The Rise Of AI, Says Jim Cramer
items.description: We recently published Jim Cramer’s Fresh 14 Stocks & Thoughts About Market Performance. Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is a SaaS company that provides customer relationship management software. The firm has spent a large portion of 2025 locked in a fierce battle with Microsoft for […]
